name: Scavenger (itch) (Flintlace)
description:
In Scavenger you have to collect a certain amount of points before you can escape this zombie infested woods with the help of hidden skills and dexterity. You are a scavenger and the space trips aren't cheap adventures so make sure you have enough to make a great escape.

Instruction

W = move up

S = move down

A = move left

D = move right

mouse cursor

Left mouse = shoot (you need something to shoot though)

Right mouse = punch

Have a good time among zombies!
